00045 namespace PACC {
00046     
00047     using namespace std;
00048     
00058     class Tokenizer {
00059      public:
00061         Tokenizer(unsigned int inBufSize=1024);
00062         
00064         Tokenizer(istream& inStream, unsigned int inBufSize=1024);
00065         
00067         ~Tokenizer(void);
00068         
00070         string getNextToken(void);
00071         
00073         bool getNextToken(string& outToken);
00074         
00076         int peekNextChar(void);
00077         
00079         void putbackToken(const string& inToken);
00080         
00082         unsigned int getLineNumber(void) {return mLine;}
00083         
00085         const string& getStreamName(void) const {return mName;}
00086         
00088         string getSingleCharTokens(void) const;
00089         
00091         string getWhiteSpace(void) const;
00092         
00094         void setBufferSize(unsigned int inSize);
00095         
00097         void setDelimiters(const string& inWhiteSpace, const string& inTokens);
00098         
00100         void setLineNumber(unsigned int inLine) {mLine = inLine;}
00101         
00103         void setStream(istream& inStream);
00104         
00106         void setStreamName(const string& inName) {mName = inName;}
00107         
00108      protected:
00110         enum DelimiterType {eWhiteSpace=1, eSingleChar};
00111         
00112         unsigned int mLine; 
00113         string mName; 
00114         istream* mStream; 
00115         char mDelimiters[256]; 
00116         char* mBuffer; 
00117         unsigned int mBufSize; 
00118         char* mBufPtr; 
00119         unsigned int mBufCount; 
00120         stack<string> mTokens; 
00121         
00123         inline unsigned int fillBuffer(void) {
00124 #ifdef PACC_GCC_LESS_THAN_3
00125             mStream->read(mBufPtr=mBuffer, mBufSize);
00126             mBufCount = mStream->gcount();
00127 #else
00128             mBufCount = mStream->readsome(mBufPtr=mBuffer, mBufSize);
00129             if(mBufCount == 0) {
00130                 // in case of console input, wait for the next character
00131                 mStream->read(mBuffer, 1);
00132                 mBufCount = mStream->gcount();
00133             }
00134 #endif
00135             return mBufCount;
00136         }
00137         
00138      private:
00139         Tokenizer(const Tokenizer&); // disable copy-constructor
00140         Tokenizer& operator=(const Tokenizer&); // disable asignment operator
00141     };
